entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 7.
